idea:
Website Link: https://defyaerospace.com/


The main objective of the company is

1) To manufacture, establish, organize, manage, run, conduct, contract, develop, handle, own and operate all types of drones such as Agricultural Drones, Pesticide Spraying Drones, Crop Monitoring Drones, Surveillance Drones.


2) To operate efficient and safe air services within India and elsewhere for transport of passengers, mail and cargo for commercial or other purposes and to execute all modes of aerial work for this purpose acquire / or to take on lease unmanned aerial vehicles.


3) To overhaul, reconstruct, assemble or recondition the same or other ancillary machines, parts, accessories thereof and also to acquire, fabricate any parts, accessories, instruments of unmanned aerial vehicles.
name: DEFY AEROSPACE PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Download SaveEat Now! 

SaveEat is a choice of a sustainable lifestyle that promotes the awareness of food surplus management through it’s easy to use mobile application.


Our partners that consist of various eateries work tirelessly to provide the best food at an affordable price which in turn is not heavy on anyone’s wallet while you get a chance to try new cuisines without worrying about emptying your wallet while we indulge our taste buds.


So instead of lonely foods reaching the bin at the end of the day, we provide them with a belly by providing the best offers that our partners have to offer almost on an hourly basis. Our dynamic eco-friendly business runs primarily through our endorsement towards reducing the food wastage at an affordable price. So let’s come together and live by.. Be it Takeaway or our upcoming delivery option... All You Need To Save The World: Eat!
name: SAVE EAT FOODS PRIVATE LIMITED

name: DYD

idea:
The Company incorporate for the following purpose:


1. To carry on the business as designer, developer, creator, buyer, seller, reseller, trader, importer, exporter, manufacturer, consultant, librarian, adviser, trainer, publisher and service providers in the field of Information Technology (IT), computer software and software packages, products, customized software, embedded software, system tools, information technology products, equipments, web designing, all types of software, software-services related to security of computer systems, mobile devices including but not limited to devices like smartphones, laptops, ipads etc. and to provide research and development, testing, quality assurance, programming, analysis and data processing and conversion services to individuals, companies, corporations, establishments and any type of organizations in India and abroad.


2. To design, develop, manufacture, assemble, service, repair, maintain, buy, sell, import, export, distribute, hire, lease, market, evaluate, benchmark, advise, consult, educate, train, deal in all types of computer peripherals hardware and peripheral devices, latest computer software system, hardware system and products for various applications, computer networks and communication, mobile device security, mobile applications, value added services including digital entertainment, information services etc.


3. To develop, provide, undertake, design, import, export, distribute and deal in Systems and application software for microprocessor based information systems, off shore software development projects, internet service provider, and solutions in all areas of application including those in niche segments like Internet and Intranet website applications, solutions software enterprise, managed security, cloud based security services either for its own use, for sale in India or for export outside India and to design and develop such systems and application software for and on behalf of manufacturers owners and users of computer, telecom, digital, electronic equipments in India and abroad.


4. To establish, maintain, manage, conduct, provide, procure or make available computer software/hardware services of every kind including commercial statistical, financial, accountancy, management, educational, engineering, data processing, computer training and educational centers, communication and other technological/social services, competence centers, technical support centers, business and information technology centers, computer audit, quality assurance services and recruitment and placement of software personnel in India or abroad.
name: KVADRATO TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED
